roleset.name: long smooth brushing motion

roles.note: arg2 added due to explicit mention of strokes in examples.

example.name: arg2 and 3
example.text: Mr. Garber depicts these moral qualities with the broad brushstrokes of a satire that occasionally descends to the realm ofcliched caricatures .
example.arg: of a satire that occasionally descends to the realm of cliched carricatures

example.name: with arg3
example.text: With rapid , sweeping strokes of the brush he creates fluid , free - floating figures

example.name: another arg2
example.text: From the horizontal and vertical strokes of hanyin script , to the snaky lines of small seal script , Wang performed all with equal facility

example.name: args 1 and 3
example.text: The first witness, like the first stroke of the brush on clear canvas, makes the first traces on minds comparatively free from any impression.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based partially on stroke-v.01, partially on noun corpus examples. Corresponds to VNcls touch-20-1, also see scribble-25.2 to better understand the brush stroke aspect of this sense.

roleset.name: Be on the receiving end of a popped blood vessel in one's head
roleset.note: Based on data from the temprel and stratified corpra. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.

example.text: Loss of speech/language function after his ischemic stroke
